org.openxava.web.layout

Class AbstractBasePainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openxava.web.layout.AbstractBasePainter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ILayoutPainter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractJspPainter

    public abstract class AbstractBasePainter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILayoutPainter, java.io.Serializable
    Base class for painters.
    Author:
    Juan Mendoza and Federico Alcantara
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
